abstract.p: Howard A Karten letter questions whether August 24 article was meant to suggest that only nerds act inappropriately on the Internet

block.p: The headline ''Revenge Among the Nerds'' (Aug. 24), for the article about Web sites that let people send angry e-mail notes anonymously, was very revealing. Did you mean to suggest that only nerds would use the virtual voodoo doll site, that only nerds use the Internet or that only nerds are upset by the rudeness of others? Whatever the meaning, the headline suggests that Circuits has a peculiar view of the audience it serves.
